title: PPC graph - opportunity cost - grain and steel

content.description: The diagram below shows the production alternatives of two countries, Alpha and Beta, producing two goods, grain and steel, using all of their available resources.
content.question: Before specialization and trade, the domestic opportunity cost of producing 1 ton of grain in Alpha and in Beta is which of the following?

content.answer:
Alpha
 Beta

1 ton of steel
